name: Color Souls
description:
Color Souls is a Splatformer where you must paint to paint where you step

This game is not for everyone, be prepared to die several times before completing a level.

Use various skills like jump, double jump, slide, wall jump, and splat paint.



Prepare for fights against powerful bosses.



Features

  • 50 Levels to you challenge
  • 4 Powerful bosses to you beat
  • Utilize parkour skills like jump, double jump, slide, wall jump
  • Paint Everything around you
